short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wevuw allows you to review anything on the web, and share your experiences with others.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
As featured on BetaList, Wevuw allows you to review anything on the web, and share your experiences with others.

Key Features: 
* See what sites are trending throughout the world 
* Vote and comment on any website
* Search for your favourite (or least favourite) websites 
* Open any site in Wevuw through the Google Chrome extension!
